duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical and administrative leadership for designated specialty clinics, ensuring quality care according to policies, regulatory requirements, and organizational values.
Oversee patient throughput, manage daily staffing needs, and ensure the highest quality patient care, safety, and satisfaction.
Participate in the hiring and ongoing performance evaluation of direct reports.

education_certification.credential: Graduation from an accredited school of Registered Nursing; Bachelor of Science degree in Nursing (BSN). Master of Science degree in Nursing or higher preferred.
